inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Sling'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Club'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Quarterstaff'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Crossbow'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficiency, Simple Weapons
description: You are able to use the simplest of weapons in combat.  This includes slings, clubs, quarterstaffs, and crossbows.
